full_text:
The efficiency after contact was incredible. He runs through you (see vs. Miami) and he runs by you (see vs. Denver).

The #Jets one of the league's finest for the future if Breece Hall bounces back well from the ACL.

#nflverse https://t.co/gTvoEl40vE https://t.co/VDU29zLPsY

Saleh and Douglas are certainly building something historically special here.

✈️ One of the best rushing attacks in franchise history before the Hall injury.
✈️ Great passing personnel held to **2020 Gase/Darnold numbers** by the young QB.
✈️ A top-3 defense.
#nflverse #Jets https://t.co/vhnAU1gguQ https://t.co/KcvC932tiX

How valuable is rushing for each QB?

Total EPA vs Total Rushing EPA

Daniel Jones:
Total EPA = 49.6 (10th)
Total Rushing EPA = 25.7 (4th)

More than half of Jones’ EPA comes from rushing!

If you subtract out EPA from all QB runs, Jones would rank 14th in EPA/play

#nflverse https://t.co/tMuPev9sDr

Added EPA/Play from All QB Rushes

• Tua has the highest overall EPA/play despite a negative EPA/play on QB rushes

• Fields (and Kyler and Russ) have a +EPA/play bc of their QB Rushes

• Daniel Jones has the 4th highest added EPA/play from rushes

Data: #nflverse https://t.co/mxXuZpizji

I was interested in the most likely playoff matchups in the wild card round. 50k simulations of the remainder of the current season resulted in the following matchups.
Dolphins at Ravens would be my favorite matchup.
#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/XU8SReuZVT

I dug out some old code on one of the first things I did with NFL play-by-play data. Special teams epa per play. 
#nflverse 
CC:@arjunmenon100 https://t.co/PLidJm63dG

A while ago, @LukeBraunNFL posted a chart showing Vikings point differential by game minute. I "zoomed in" a little and computed it by game second for all teams.
There is so much to see in this chart, I love it.
Data: #nflverse https://t.co/c75962qSnm

Day 31 (1/2): For #Thanksgiving2022  I'll do a quick analysis of Thanksgiving Day games since 1999 (data courtesy of #nflverse). 

Some fun facts:
1. Detroit has lost 70% of their games
2. The Rams (LA or STL), Browns, and Jags haven't played on Thanksgiving

#100daysofcoding

Updated prior to Week 12: Relative team efficiency scores, constructed using a blend of z-score standardized EPA/P and SR%

Data is from weeks 2-11. Early downs, opponent adjusted, turnovers are excluded, garbage time is excluded

#nflverse https://t.co/X0yzvyIsGV

The entire #nflverse has been such a foundational piece of my journey as a fan, and an analyst in my work. That community constantly surprises me and inspires new ways of thinking. Shout out to @reinhardNFL in particular for his quality of work and kindness in interactions. (2/4)
Week 11 of the #nfl season kicks off tonight, so let's take a look at what my models sees as the current state of the league #nflverse #rstats
Jumping ahead to Week 11 picks, the model likes @packers, despite conventional wisdom, and sees a @Saints victory over a reeling @RamsNFL team.  #nflverse https://t.co/mlJh3tp2vZ

KC vs LAC Snaps by Formations!!! Here's KC's offense. Successful in every formation that had multiple snaps. Jet is still getting the majority of the 11 personnel RB snaps. Watson is clearly the JuJu replacement. Moore with a season high % of everything. 

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/WOhj0UxRey

Defense. Mixed bag here, as is typically the case when you face a good offense. Our defense did well in 3-3-5 and 3-2-6, not so great in 4-2-5 or 4-3-4. Karlaftis with a season low snap %.

NOTE: Dunlap is officially listed as a LB. Blame KC and NFL for that. 

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/WZyca5BpFO

Here's LAC's numbers for the game. Positive EPA/play for every offensive formation. That's impressive. Overall, though, our D held them to 0.14 EPA/play, which is solid vs a good O. On defense, they got absolutely COOKED in their top two formations. 

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/pmN7UA7ite

Some good conversation today about DTs that specialize in stopping the run, so I wanted to get a better picture of who those players are.

Up & right are players who are better against the run and play in run-heavy situations, down & left is the opposite.

Data: PFF & #nflverse https://t.co/eBllbP1ZYP

honestly this is starting to become a sweat

#nflverse https://t.co/hWRNpZQQR1

Places you can find me: 

Mastodon: https://t.co/ZfktWlshyL
R4DS Slack: https://t.co/zmXCiw0KuL (#rstats nerdery)
#nflverse discord: https://t.co/dFZxF5ykoc (nfl nerdery)
@dynasty_discord discord: https://t.co/8IyYhRUccP (fantasy football stuff)

…and here.

NFL density plots are back!
Let's take a look at Eagles 2022 season!

Jalen Hurts had just one bad EPA/play game, all the 2022 games are well clustered on the right!

#nflverse #ggplot2 #RStats https://t.co/N95pZwY9Ka

Patrick Mahomes and Tua Tagovailoa are the best QBs in late downs this season, by a lot!!

#nflverse #ggplot2 #RStats https://t.co/sNmQOqmEuR

Added EPA/Play from All QB Rushes

• Tua has the highest overall EPA/play despite a negative EPA/play on QB rushes

• Fields (and Kyler and Russ) have a +EPA/play bc of their QB Rushes

• Daniel Jones has the 4th highest added EPA/play from rushes

Data: #nflverse https://t.co/mxXuZpizji

Week 11 of the #nfl season kicks off tonight, so let's take a look at what my models sees as the current state of the league #nflverse #rstats
Jumping ahead to Week 11 picks, the model likes @packers, despite conventional wisdom, and sees a @Saints victory over a reeling @RamsNFL team.  #nflverse https://t.co/mlJh3tp2vZ

KC vs LAC Snaps by Formations!!! Here's KC's offense. Successful in every formation that had multiple snaps. Jet is still getting the majority of the 11 personnel RB snaps. Watson is clearly the JuJu replacement. Moore with a season high % of everything. 

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/WOhj0UxRey

Defense. Mixed bag here, as is typically the case when you face a good offense. Our defense did well in 3-3-5 and 3-2-6, not so great in 4-2-5 or 4-3-4. Karlaftis with a season low snap %.

NOTE: Dunlap is officially listed as a LB. Blame KC and NFL for that. 

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/WZyca5BpFO

Here's LAC's numbers for the game. Positive EPA/play for every offensive formation. That's impressive. Overall, though, our D held them to 0.14 EPA/play, which is solid vs a good O. On defense, they got absolutely COOKED in their top two formations. 

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/pmN7UA7ite

Some good conversation today about DTs that specialize in stopping the run, so I wanted to get a better picture of who those players are.

Up & right are players who are better against the run and play in run-heavy situations, down & left is the opposite.

NFL density plots are back!
Let's take a look at Eagles 2022 season!

Jalen Hurts had just one bad EPA/play game, all the 2022 games are well clustered on the right!

#nflverse #ggplot2 #RStats https://t.co/N95pZwY9Ka

#nflverse #ggplot2 #RStats https://t.co/sNmQOqmEuR

The efficiency after contact was incredible. He runs through you (see vs. Miami) and he runs by you (see vs. Denver).

The #Jets one of the league's finest for the future if Breece Hall bounces back well from the ACL.

#nflverse https://t.co/gTvoEl40vE https://t.co/VDU29zLPsY

Saleh and Douglas are certainly building something historically special here.

✈️ One of the best rushing attacks in franchise history before the Hall injury.
✈️ Great passing personnel held to **2020 Gase/Darnold numbers** by the young QB.
✈️ A top-3 defense.
#nflverse #Jets https://t.co/vhnAU1gguQ https://t.co/KcvC932tiX

How valuable is rushing for each QB?

Total EPA vs Total Rushing EPA

Daniel Jones:
Total EPA = 49.6 (10th)
Total Rushing EPA = 25.7 (4th)

More than half of Jones’ EPA comes from rushing!

If you subtract out EPA from all QB runs, Jones would rank 14th in EPA/play

#nflverse https://t.co/tMuPev9sDr

• Tua has the highest overall EPA/play despite a negative EPA/play on QB rushes

• Fields (and Kyler and Russ) have a +EPA/play bc of their QB Rushes

• Daniel Jones has the 4th highest added EPA/play from rushes

Day 31 (1/2): For #Thanksgiving2022  I'll do a quick analysis of Thanksgiving Day games since 1999 (data courtesy of #nflverse).

2. The Rams (LA or STL), Browns, and Jags haven't played on Thanksgiving

KC vs LAC Snaps by Formations!!! Here's KC's offense. Successful in every formation that had multiple snaps. Jet is still getting the majority of the 11 personnel RB snaps. Watson is clearly the JuJu replacement. Moore with a season high % of everything. 

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/WOhj0UxRey

Defense. Mixed bag here, as is typically the case when you face a good offense. Our defense did well in 3-3-5 and 3-2-6, not so great in 4-2-5 or 4-3-4. Karlaftis with a season low snap %.

NOTE: Dunlap is officially listed as a LB. Blame KC and NFL for that. 

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/WZyca5BpFO

Here's LAC's numbers for the game. Positive EPA/play for every offensive formation. That's impressive. Overall, though, our D held them to 0.14 EPA/play, which is solid vs a good O. On defense, they got absolutely COOKED in their top two formations. 

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/pmN7UA7ite

Some good conversation today about DTs that specialize in stopping the run, so I wanted to get a better picture of who those players are.

Up & right are players who are better against the run and play in run-heavy situations, down & left is the opposite.
